entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
